chain.name: The Ore of Dark Crystal
procedures: Talk to General Maestro in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 20 Dull Crystal from Drumming Bunny.
Go back to General Maestro and give the collected item to him.

chain.name: Where's the Power of Origin?
procedures: Talk to General Maestro in Omega Sector.
Head over to Omega Sector: Kulan Field II and search for 1 Gray's Document by hitting the crates around the map.
Return to General Maestro  once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Terminating the Dark Force
rewards: Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 10% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 10% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to General Maestro in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 30 Dull Crystal from Drumming Bunny.
Collect 10 Dark Crystal Ore.
Return to General Maestro and give him the collected items.

chain.name: The Drumming Bunny
procedures: Search for Roly-Poly 5 in Ludibrium: Eos Tower 60th Floor.
Hunt for 100 Toy Drum from Drumming Bunny.
Return to Roly-Poly 5 once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Eliminating the Drumming Bunny
rewards: Great Blue Helmet x 1 if you are a Warrior
Brown Matty x 1 if you are a Magician
Green Pole-Feather Hat x 1 if you are a Bowman
Green Burgler x 1 if you are a Thief
Blue Den Marine x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Search for Roly-Poly 5 in Ludibrium: Eos Tower 60th Floor.
Hunt for 1000 Toy Drum from Drumming Bunny.
Return to Roly-Poly 5 once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Hoony's Toothache
rewards: Scroll for Pet Equip. for Speed 60% x 3
procedures: Talk to Hoony in Omega Sector: Boswell Field III.
Purchase 1 Pain Reliever from Dr. Pepper in Omega Sector: Silo.
Talk to Hoony again once you have collected the item.

name: A Delivery to a Lost Time

chain.name: The Broken Clocktower
procedures: Talk to Olson the Toy Soldier located at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 100th Floor.
Head over to Ludibrium: Lost Time <1> and look for Grandpa Clock.

chain.name: Grandpa Clock's Crisis
procedures: Hunt for 1 All-purpose Clock Spring from Tick-Tock.
Return to Grandpa Clock and give him the item.

chain.name: Delivering the Pendulum
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Lastly, find Olson the Toy Soldier and talk to him.

chain.name: Rocky's Parts
procedures: Talk to Rocky the Repairman in Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Main Process 2>.
Collect 30 Screw.
Collect 50 Cog from Chronos.
Head back to Rocky the Repairman and give him all of the collected items.

chain.name: The Clocktower Headache
procedures: Talk to Grandpa Clock who is located at Ludibrium: Lost Time <1>.
Eliminate 80 Tick.
Go back to Grandpa Clock and talk to him.

name: Tae Gong's Love for His Wife

chain.name: Finding Tae Gong
procedures: Search for Tae Gong at Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to him.
Hunt for 20 Shrimp Meat.

chain.name: Finding Tae Gong's Wife
procedures: Go to Korean Folk Town and give the collected item to Grandma Yeon.

chain.name: Eos Tower Threatened!
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Marcel in Ludibrium.
Eliminate 25 Block Golem.
Eliminate 15 King Block Golem.
Return to Marcel after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Where is Dogon's HQ?
procedures: Talk to Chury in Omega Sector: Silo.
Go to Omega Sector: Kulan Field V and locate Hidden Street: Entrance to Dogon's HQ.
Next, locate Hidden Street: Dogon's HQ.
Once inside, use the teleporters to reach the top right of the map.
Hit the big electrical machine to obtain 1 Dogon's Report. If the item didn't drop, wait until the machine respawns then hit it again.
Talk to Chury again once you have collected the item.

chain.name: Cleaning Up Helios Tower
procedures: Talk to Marcel in Ludibrium.
Eliminate 20 Retz.
Talk to Marcel again once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Mr. Shim's Request
procedures: Talk to Mr. Shim in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 300 State-Held Rice from Retz.
Talk to Mr. Shim again once you have collected the items.

name: Retrieving the Storybook: Mr. Shim Chung

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: Mr. Shim Chung
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on Shim Chung from Mr. Shim's Request quest, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

chain.name: Today's Schedule
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.
Hunt for 100 Cog from Chronos.
Return to Betty after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Helping Fix Eos Tower
rewards: Work Gloves x 1 if you are a Beginner
Yellow Briggon x 1 if you are a Warrior
Blue Noel x 1 if you are a Magician
Mithril Scaler x 1 if you are a Bowman
Orihalcon Arbion x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Jeweled x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Roly-Poly 8 located at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 21st Floor.
Obtain 20 Plastic Crown while eliminating 25 King Bloctopus.
Return to Roly-Poly 8 once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Blocktopus is an Alien?
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim at Omega Sector: Command Center.
Hunt for 1 Bloctopus Key Chain from Bloctopus.
Return to Dr. Kim and talk to him.

chain.name: Assembling a Toy
procedures: Talk to Hans the Assembler in Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Process 2> Zone 2.
Hunt for 20 Cheap Battery from Robo.
Hunt for 20 Mechanical Heart from Master Robo.
Hunt for 30 Cog from Chronos.
Return to Hans the Assembler after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Rightful Donation Culture
procedures: Talk to Tigun the Advisor at Ludibrium: Eos Tower Entrance.
Obtain 1 Sapphire.
Go back to him once you have collected the item.

chain.name: Grandma Yeon's Pot
procedures: Talk to Grandma Yeon in Korean Folk Town.
Give her 5,000 mesos.

chain.name: The Brother's Stack of Rice 1
procedures: Talk to Chil Sung in Korean Folk Town. You will be rewarded 1 Sack Of Rice.
Head over to Chil Nam's Rice Stacks and talk to it.

chain.name: The Brother's Stack of Rice 2
procedures: Talk to Chil Nam in Korean Folk Town. You will be rewarded 1 Sack Of Rice.
Head over to Chil Sung's Rice Stacks and talk to it.

chain.name: The Brother's Stack of Rice 3
procedures: Talk to Chil Sung in Korean Folk Town. You will be rewarded 1 Sack Of Rice.
Head over to Chil Nam's Rice Stacks and talk to it.

chain.name: The Brother's Stack of Rice 4
procedures: Talk to Chil Nam in Korean Folk Town. You will be rewarded 1 Sack Of Rice.
Head over to Chil Sung's Rice Stacks and talk to it.

chain.name: Brotherly Love
procedures: Talk to Chil Sung in Korean Folk Town.
Lastly, talk to Chil Nam.

chain.name: Chil Nam's Buckwheat Paste
procedures: Talk to Chil Nam in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 4 Tiger Stamp.
Return to Chil Nam after you have collected the item.

name: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon

chain.name: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon
rewards: Storybook on The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon x 1
procedures: Talk to Haenim in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 20 Tough Rope from Hodori.
Hunt for 1 Slippery Oil from Cico.
Return to Haenim after you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: The Lost Seed
procedures: Talk to Swallow in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 1 Swallow's Lost Seed from Moon Bunny.
Return to Swallow after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Opening Nolbu's Gourd
rewards: Storybook on Hongbu And Nolbu x 1
Must not have completed the quest Opening Hongbu's Gourd in order to complete this one.
procedures: Talk to Nolbu in Korean Folk Town.
You will be rewarded with 1 Nolbu's Seed.
Go to the top of his roof and drop 1 Nolbu's Seed.  Wait a few seconds for the seed to grow into a gourd.
Attack the gourd until it drops 1 Warrant Of Attachment.
Return to Nolbu and give him the obtained item.

chain.name: Opening Hongbu's Gourd
rewards: Storybook on Hongbu And Nolbu x 1
Must not have completed the quest Opening Nolbu's Gourd in order to complete this one.
procedures: Talk to Hongbu in Korean Folk Town.
You will be rewarded with 1 Hongbu's Seed.
Go to the top of his roof and drop 1 Hongbu's Seed.  Wait a few seconds for the seed to grow into a gourd.
Attack the gourd until it drops 1 Box of Jewelry.
Return to Hongbu and give him the obtained item.

chain.name: Pot with a Hole
procedures: Talk to Kong Ji in Korean Folk Town.
Obtain 1 New Pot by completing the quest, Grandma Yeon's Pot.
Return to Kong Ji after you have obtained the item.

chain.name: Extracting Artemesia
procedures: Talk to Kong Ji in Korean Folk Town.
Collect 12 Artemisia by hitting the small plants outside of Korean Folk Town.
Return to Kong Ji after you have obtained the item.

chain.name: The Wooden Hoe That Snapped
rewards: Storybook on Kong Ji And Pat Ji x 1
procedures: Talk to Kong Ji in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 1 Steel Hoe from Blin.
Return to Kong Ji after you have obtained the item.

chain.name: Kong Ji's Rice Wine
procedures: Talk to Kong Ji in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 3 Three-Tailed Foxtail.
Go back to Kong Ji after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: Brotherly Love
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on Brotherly Love from the quest, Brotherly Love, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

name: Retrieving the Storybook: Hongbu and Nolbu

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: Hongbu and Nolbu
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on Hongbu And Nolbu from the quest, Opening Hongbu's Gourd or Opening Nolbu's Gourd, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

name: Retrieving the Storybook: Kong Ji and Pat Ji

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: Kong Ji and Pat Ji
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on Kong Ji And Pat Ji from the quest, Kong Ji's Request, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

itemsNeeded.name: Storybook on Kong Ji And Pat Ji

name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon from the quest, The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

itemsNeeded.name: Storybook on The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon

chain.name: Eliminating Grays
procedures: Search for Black Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Kulan Field I.
Eliminate 30 Barnard Gray.
Return to Black Mesoranger once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Chil Sung's Roasted Pork
procedures: Talk to Chil Sung in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 5 Pounder.
Return to Chil Sung after you have collected the item.

chain.name: The Alarm Clock
procedures: Search for Pink Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field II.
Hunt for 20 Table Clock from Tick-Tock.
Return to Pink Mesoranger once you have gathered the items.

chain.name: Assembling the Alarm Clock
procedures: Search for Pink Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field II.
Hunt for 10 Table Clock from Tick-Tock.
Hunt for 10 Cog from Chronos.
Hunt for 2 Special Battery from Master Robo.
Return to Pink Mesoranger once you have gathered the items.

chain.name: A Sleeping Monster
procedures: Search for Pink Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field II.
Head to Omega Sector and talk to Kevin the Soldier.

chain.name: The Completion of the Alarm Clock
procedures: Deliver the item to Pink Mesoranger.

chain.name: The Clock Workers' Batteries
rewards: Orange Sporty T-Shirt (M) x 1 if you are a Beginner
Pink Starry Shirt (F) x 1 if you are a Beginner
Maroon Jangoon Armor (M) x 1 if you are a Warrior
Brown Jangoon Armor (F) x 1 if you are a Warrior
Red Starlight (M) x 1 if you are a Magician
Red Moonlight (F) x 1 if you are a Magician
Brown Piette (M) x 1 if you are a Bowman
White Piettra (F) x 1 if you are a Bowman
Marine Shadow (M) x 1 if you are a Thief
Purple Shadow (F) x 1 if you are a Thief
Red Barbay x 1 if you are a Pirate
The reward for the classes depends on your character's gender.
procedures: Talk to Grandpa Clock at Ludibrium: Lost Time <1>.
Hunt for 200 Cheap Battery from Robo.
Go back to Grandpa Clock and give him the collected item.

chain.name: Fixing Eos Tower
procedures: Talk to Roly-Poly 10 located at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 3rd Floor.
Hunt for 30 Yellow Toy Block from Block Golem.
Hunt for 15 Blue Toy Block from King Block Golem.
Return to Roly-Poly 10 once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Peace at Eos Tower
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gloves for ATT 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Marcel in Ludibrium.
Search for Hidden Street: Hidden Tower at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 8th Floor.
Fight against Rombot.
Return to Marcel after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Eliminating Aliens
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Kill 5 MT-09.
Return to Dr. Kim  once you have completed the task.

name: The Revolutionary Plan for Constructing Defensive Walls

chain.name: The Revolutionary Plan for Constructing Defensive Walls
procedures: Talk to Jr. Officer Medin in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 20 Yellow Toy Block within 30 minutes.
Go to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Collecting 100 Mateon Tentacles
procedures: Talk to Rice the Medic in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 100 Mateon's Tentacle from Mateon.
Return to Rice the Medic and give him the item.

chain.name: Collecting 200 Mateon Tentacles
procedures: Talk to Rice the Medic in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 200 Mateon's Tentacle from Mateon.

chain.name: Collecting 300 Mateon Tentacles
procedures: Talk to Rice the Medic in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 300 Mateon's Tentacle from Mateon.
Return to Rice the Medic and give him the item.

chain.name: Collecting 400 Mateon Tentacles
procedures: Talk to Rice the Medic in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 400 Mateon's Tentacle from Mateon.
Return to Rice the Medic and give him the item.

chain.name: Collecting 500 Mateon Tentacles
rewards: Maroon Jangoon Boots x 1 if you are a Warrior
Gold Moon Shoes x 1 if you are a Magician
Yellow Pierre Shoes x 1 if you are a Bowman
Black Blue-Lines Shoes x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Leather Krag x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Rice the Medic in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 500 Mateon's Tentacle from Mateon.
Return to Rice the Medic and give him the item.

chain.name: Mac the Mechanic's Maintenance Manual
procedures: Talk to Mac the Mechanic in Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Process 2> Zone 4.
In the same map, hit the blue boxes with a star on them until it brings you to Hidden Street: Secret Factory.
Inside Hidden Street: Secret Factory, hit the blue boxes again. Some of them will either disappear or spawn Toy Trojan.
Hunt for 1 Maintenance Manual from Toy Trojan.
Return to Mac the Mechanic and give him the collected item.

chain.name: Sword Dance
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Talk to Muhamad in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.

chain.name: Making the Fancy Sword
procedures: Hunt for 4 Cat's Eye Stone.
Hunt for 30 Kiyo's Beak.
Return to Muhamad after you have collected all the items and pay him 5,000 mesos to complete the quest.

chain.name: Deliver the Fancy Sword
procedures: Talk to Muhamad in Ariant: The Town of Ariant and you will obtain 1 Double Sword for Dancing.
Give the obtained item to Sirin to complete the quest.

chain.name: The Little Prince that Loves Roses
procedures: Talk to Le Petit Prince in The Burning Sands: Dry Desert.
Collect 5 Desert Mist from Jr. Cactus, Cactus or Royal Cactus.
Return to him after you have collected the item.

chain.name: The Little Prince that Loves the Stars
procedures: Talk to Le Petit Prince in The Burning Sands: Dry Desert.
Hunt for 20 Telescope.
Return to him after you have collected the item.

name: Recovering the Book: The Little Prince

chain.name: Recovering the Book: The Little Prince 1
procedures: Talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.
Go to The Burning Sands: Dry Desert and talk to Le Petit Prince.

chain.name: Recovering the Book: The Little Prince 2
procedures: Talk to Le Petit Prince in The Burning Sands: Dry Desert and you will obtain 1 Little Prince Storybook.
Bring the obtained item to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

chain.name: Helping Out Bedin
procedures: Equip the Zenumist's Cape.
Talk to Bedin at Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway.
Hunt 50 Flaming Desert from Dark Sand Dwarf.
Gather 5 Silver Ore.
Pass the collected items plus 10,000 mesos to Bedin.
chain.npcLocation: Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway

chain.name: Russellon's Items for Experiment
rewards: Triple Rumo has a higher percentage of dropping Lumo's Leaf.
procedures: Equip the Alcadno's Cape.
Talk to Russellon at Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Center Gate.
Go to Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - Unit 103 and hunt 10 Lumo's Leaf from Rumo and Triple Rumo.
chain.npcLocation: Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Center Gate

chain.name: Scheherazade Fear
procedures: Talk to Schegerazade in Ariant Castle: King's Room.
Head over to Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library> and talk to Wiz the Librarian.

chain.name: Borrowing the book from Wiz
procedures: Talk to Wiz the Librarian once again.
Head back to Ariant Castle: King's Room and talk to Schegerazade.

chain.name: Scheherazade's Storybook
procedures: Talk to Schegerazade in Ariant Castle: King's Room and you will obtain 1 Scheherazade’s Storybook.
Go to Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library> and give the obtained item to Wiz the Librarian.

chain.name: Scheherazade the Storyteller
procedures: Talk to Wiz the Librarian in Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library> and you will obtain 1 Wiz's Storybook.
Go to Ariant Castle: King's Room and give the obtained item to Schegerazade.

chain.name: The Bounty Hunt
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Find Jano inside the house all the way on the right in Ariant: The Town of Ariant and talk to him.
Obtain 1 Lidium.

Talk to Muhamad in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.  Answer his questions correctly:

(Second choice) "Have you heard that a group of merchants crossing through the desert were attacked by the monsters?"
(Second choice) "This is all because of the Queen's negligence in maintaining the safety of the town."
(First choice) "What is the guardian of the deserts doing when we're under the Queen's tyranny?"
(First choice) "Perhaps Deo has already turned into a monster."
(Second choice) "Have you heard that a group of merchants crossing through the desert were attacked by the monsters?"
(Second choice) "This is all because of the Queen's negligence in maintaining the safety of the town."
(First choice) "What is the guardian of the deserts doing when we're under the Queen's tyranny?"
(First choice) "Perhaps Deo has already turned into a monster."
Return to Jano and talk to him.
Go to Hidden Street: Royal Cactus Desert and defeat Deo.
Return to Jano and talk to him.

name: In Search of the Long Lost Pyramid

chain.name: In Search of the Long Lost Pyramid
procedures: Click the lightbulb above your head to talk to Byron.
Talk to Duarte.

chain.name: Icarus' Hang Glider
procedures: Talk to Icarus in Kerning City.
Hunt for 50 Stirge Wing from Stirge.
Hunt for 50 Stiff Feather.
Make 10 Processed Wood.
Return to Icarus once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: POLLUTED! <3-Jr. Boogie>
procedures: Talk to Wanted: Jr. Boogie in Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye IV.
Hunt for 10 Jr. Boogie's Horns.
Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood once you have collected the necessary items.
chain.npcLocation: Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye IV

chain.name: Special Taste of Florina Beach I
rewards: Coconuts can be collected by knocking them out of the trees in the next map.
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.
Collect 10 Coconut.
Return to Riel once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Special Taste of Florina Beach II
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.
Collect 12 Coconut.
Hunt for 12 Lupin's Banana from Lupin.
Hunt for 130 Lorang's Claws from Lorang.
Return to Riel once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Special Taste of Florina Beach III
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.
Collect 25 Coconut.
Hunt for 25 Lupin's Banana from Lupin.
Hunt for 130 Lorang's Claws from Lorang.
Hunt for 130 Clang's Claws from Clang.
Return to Riel once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Special Taste of Florina Beach IV
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.
Collect 10 Coconut.
Hunt for 10 Lupin's Banana from Lupin.
Hunt for 10 Lorang's Claws from Lorang.
Hunt for 10 Clang's Claws from Clang.
Return to Riel once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Truth of the Rumor
procedures: Find Winston at Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II and talk to him.

Complete the following quests:
- Truth of the Rumor - Blackbull
- Truth of the Rumor - Manji
- Truth of the Rumor - Ayan
- Truth of the Rumor - Dances with Balrog
- Truth of the Rumor - Betty
Return to Winston and talk to him.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II

chain.name: Stump Research
procedures: Talk to Winston in Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.
Hunt for 100 Very Dry Branch from Stump, Dark Stump, Axe Stump or Dark Axe Stump.
Return to him after you have collected the items.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II

chain.name: Monstrous Tree Stumpy
procedures: Talk to Winston once again.
Eliminate 1 Stumpy.
Return to Winston after you have completed the given task.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II

name: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Dolls

chain.name: Collecting 100 Cursed Dolls
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 100 Cursed Doll from Zombie Lupin.
Return to Rowen the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Collecting 200 Cursed Dolls
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 200 Cursed Doll from Zombie Lupin.
Return to Rowen the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Collecting 400 Cursed Dolls
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 400 Cursed Doll from Zombie Lupin.
Return to Rowen the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Collecting 600 Cursed Dolls
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for DEX 10% x 1
Scroll for Gloves for DEX 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 600 Cursed Doll from Zombie Lupin.
Return to Rowen the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Collecting 1000 Cursed Dolls
rewards: Steel Nordic Helm x 1 if you are a Warrior
Dark Guiltian x 1 if you are a Magician
Dark Distinction x 1 if you are a Bowman
Dark Pilfer x 1 if you are a Thief
Red Misty x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 1000 Cursed Doll from Zombie Lupin.
Return to Rowen the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Chief Stan's Letter
procedures: Talk to Chief Stan in Henesys.
You will obtain 1 Sealed Letter.
Head over to Omega Sector: Command Center and give the item to Dr. Kim

name: Two Ways to Get to Korean Folk Town

chain.name: Camila's Lost Letter
procedures: Talk to Camila in Henesys.
Hunt Curse Eye until it drops The Letter to Camila.
Return to Camila and pass the item to her.

chain.name: Korean Folk Town: Through the Sky
rewards: Note: Camila says that she will give you a ticket for the flight, however, in a later patch flights were made free to everyone.  Therefore, you will not receive a ticket.
procedures: Talk to Camila and choose the option Korean Folk Town: Through the Sky.

chain.name: Two Ways to Get to Korean Folk Town
procedures: Travel to Korean Folk Town and give Kong Ji the letter, Camila's Reply.

chain.name: Bruce's Research
procedures: Talk to Bruce in Henesys.
Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.
Return to Bruce.

chain.name: Gwin's Thanks
rewards: The quest Jay's Curiosity needs to be in progress.
Bob's Snail Shell will not be removed from your inventory.
procedures: Talk to Gwin in Dungeon: Another Entrance.
Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.
Return to Gwin.

name: Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days

chain.name: Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days
rewards: The quest Jay's Curiosity needs to be in progress.
Bob's Snail Shell will not be removed from your inventory.
procedures: Talk to Grendel the Really Old at Ellinia.
Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.
Return to Grendel the Really Old.

chain.name: The Rememberer's Passion Part 1
rewards: The quest Jay's Curiosity needs to be in progress.
Bob's Snail Shell will be removed from your inventory.
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer at Sleepywood.
Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.
Return to The Rememberer.

chain.name: The Rememberer's Passion Part 2
rewards: The quest Jay's Curiosity needs to be in progress.
Bob's Snail Shell will not be removed from your inventory.
procedures: Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.
Find and defeat 1 Snail to obtain 1 Snail Shell.
Return to The Rememberer  at Sleepywood and talk to him.

chain.name: Jay's Curiosity
procedures: Talk to Jay in Henesys.
Head to Dungeon: Drake's Meal Table, and kill Bob to obtain 1 Bob's Snail Shell.

Complete the following quests:
- Bruce's Research
- Gwin's Thanks
- Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days
- The Rememberer's Passion
Return to Jay and talk to him.

chain.name: Blake's Dream
procedures: Talk to Jake at Victoria Road: Subway Ticketing Booth.
Then head to Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station and talk to Blake.

chain.name: My Dream Is To...
procedures: Talk to Blake at Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station.
Head to Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby and talk to Lana.
chain.npcLocation: Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station

chain.name: Lana's Decision
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Walk over and talk to Robby Fray.

chain.name: Convince Robby Fray
procedures: Talk to Robby Fray at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 30 Cherry Bubble from Cherry Bubble Tea.
Hunt for 30 Melon Bubble from Melon Bubble Tea.
Hunt for 40 Mango Bubble from Mango Bubble Tea.
Return to Robby Fray and give him the collected items.

chain.name: The Secret Recipe
procedures: Talk to Robby Fray at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 1 Secret Recipe from Yeti Doll Claw Game, Transformed Doll Claw Game [2] or Jr. Pepe Doll Claw Game on the 3rd-4th floor area of the mall.
Return to Robby Fray and give him the item.

chain.name: Reception Party Preparation, Done!
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Walk over and talk to Tina.

chain.name: Makeup Artist, Booked!
procedures: Talk to Lana in Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Walk over and talk to Marshall.

chain.name: Marshall's Refusal
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 1 Locker Key from Kid Mannequin, Female Mannequin or Male Mannequin on the 5th-6th floor of the mall.
Click on the Lockers at Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station.

chain.name: Legendary Scissors
procedures: Click on the Lockers at Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station again to receive the Legendary Scissors.
Return to Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby and give the item to Marshall.
chain.npcLocation: Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station

chain.name: Hair Stylist, Booked!
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Walk over and talk to Lala.

chain.name: Tina's Proposition
procedures: Talk to Tina at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.

Hunt for 50 Yeti Keychain from Yeti Doll Claw Game, 50 Jr. Pepe Keychain from Jr. Pepe Doll Claw Game and 20 Orange Mushroom Doll from Transformed Doll Claw Game [2] on the 3rd-4th floors of the mall.
Return to Tina and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Costume Preparation
procedures: Talk to Lala at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 50 Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit  from Kid Mannequin, 50  Female Mannequin's Wig from Female Mannequin and 50 Male Mannequin's Fedora from Male Mannequin on the 5th-6th floors of the mall.
Return to Lala and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Costume Preparation, Done!
procedures: Talk to Lala at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 30 Pink Perfume from Pink Perfume [2], 30 Yellow Perfume from Yellow Perfume [2] and 30 Blue Perfume from Blue Perfume [2] on the 3rd-4th floors of the mall.
Return to Lala and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Rose Scent
procedures: Talk to Lala at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.  She will spray Rose Scent on you.
Hurry over to Lana and talk to her before the scent disappears.

chain.name: Freesia Scent
procedures: Talk to Lala at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.  She will spray Freesia Scent on you.
Hurry over to Lana and talk to her before the scent disappears.

chain.name: Music Preparation
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 50 Latest Hits Compilation from Latest Hits Compilation and 50 Greatest Oldies from Greatest Oldies on the 7th-8th floors of the mall.
Return to Lana and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Lavender Scent
procedures: Talk to Lala at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.  She will spray Lavender Scent on you.
Hurry over to Lana and talk to her before the scent disappears.

chain.name: Request for a New Song
procedures: Talk to Maestro Rho at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Go to the 7th-8th floors of the mall and hunt 50 Cheap Amplifier for 1 Latest Model MP3.
Return to Maestro Rho and give him the collected item.

chain.name: Composition Fee
procedures: Talk to Maestro Rho at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Hunt for 50 Fancy Amplifier Cables from Fancy Amplifier on the 7th-8th floors of the mall.
Return to Maestro Rho and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Say "NO" to Plagiarism
procedures: Talk to Maestro Rho at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Go to Kerning Square: 7th Floor 8th Floor Area D and defeat Spirit of Rock.  Remember the song that he plays when he dies.  Pick up the Spirit of Rock's Music Score.
Return to Maestro Rho.

chain.name: Debut Preparations Completed
rewards: Piercing of the Free Spirit x 1
procedures: Talk to Lana at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Go to Kerning City Subway: Kerning Square Station and talk to Blake.

chain.name: Admission to the VIP Zone
procedures: Talk to June at Kerning Square: 7th Floor 8th Floor Area A.
Hunt for 10 VIP Invitation from any monster in the Kerning Square mall.
Return to June and give him the collected items to gain access to the VIP Zone.

chain.name: The New Song
procedures: Talk to Maestro Rho in Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Obtain the Composition Notes and take them to Lana.

chain.name: The Last Song
procedures: Talk to Maestro Rho at Kerning Square: Kerning Square Lobby.
Choose the correct song that Spirit of Rock played when he died.

chain.name: Icarus and the Balloon
procedures: Talk to Icarus in Kerning City.
Hunt for 100 Tablecloth from Jr. Wraith.
Hunt for 10 Alligator Skin Pouch from Ligator.
Return to Icarus once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Delivering a Mysterious Item
procedures: Talk to Wing the Fairy in Ellinia to obtain Tears of Kelvelos.
Go to Orbis and talk to Kriel the Fairy .

chain.name: Helping Kriel Out
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Kriel the Fairy  in Orbis.
Hunt for 200 Solid Horn.
Hunt for 20 Empty Potion Bottle by hitting the wooden crates around Orbis.
Hunt for 50 Nependeath's Seed from Nependeath.
Return to Kriel the Fairy  once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Maya's Concerns 1
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 20 Leatty Furball from Leatty.
Hunt for 20 Cold Eye's Tail from Cold Eye.
Collect 50 Holy Water.
Return to Maya once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Maya's Concerns 2
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 30 Flyeye Wing from Flyeye.
Hunt for 30 Nependeath's Seed from Nependeath.
Collect 50 Antidote.
Return to Maya once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Maya's Concerns 3
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 100 Jr. Pepe's Fish from Jr. Pepe.
Return to Maya once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Lionel's Necklace 1
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.

chain.name: Lionel's Necklace 2
procedures: Talk to Teo in Lith Harbor.
Hunt for 7 Luster Pixie's Sunpiece from Luster Pixie.
Hunt for 50 Croco Skin from Croco.
Hunt for 50 Dragon Skin.
Return to Teo once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Lionel's Necklace 3
procedures: Return to Maya with the item made by Teo and talk to her.

chain.name: Jane's First Challenge
procedures: Talk to Jane in Lith Harbor.
Hunt for 20 Malady's Experimental Frog from Malady.
Hunt for 30 Medicine With Weird Vibes from Wraith.
Purchase 1 Pure Water from Valen or from Mr. Sweatbottom in Sleepywood Sauna.
Return to Jane once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Jane's Second Challenge
procedures: Talk to Jane in Lith Harbor.
Hunt for 30 Malady's Experimental Frog from Malady.
Hunt for 100 Medicine With Weird Vibes from Wraith.
Hunt for 3 Drake's Blood from Drake.
Hunt for 1 Mushmom's Spore from Mushmom.
Return to Jane once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Jane's Final Challenge
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 10% x 1
Scroll for Gloves for ATT 60% x 1
Click on Jane to see a list of the items that may now be bought from her as part of the reward.
procedures: Talk to Jane in Lith Harbor.
Hunt for 10 Sap of Ancient Tree from Dark Axe Stump.
Hunt for 20 Dragon Skin.
Have Arwen the Fairy in Ellinia make Moon Rock.
Return to Jane once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Shumi's Lost Sack of Money
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 100% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1

Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Gold Ore
Black Crystal Ore
Diamond Ore
procedures: Talk to Shumi in Kerning City.
Buy 1 Ticket to Construction Site B3 from Jake, then enter through The Ticket Gate.
Climb steps 1, 2, and 3 of Construction Site B3 and double click on the chest at the top.
Return Shumi's Sack of Cash to Shumi.

chain.name: About the Amorian Challenge!
procedures: Talk to Ames the Wise in Amoria.
Find Amos the Strong at Hidden Street: Amos' Training Ground and talk to him.

chain.name: Alcaster's Cape
procedures: Talk to Alcaster at El Nath.
Obtain 4 Garnet.
Obtain 2 The Magic Rock.
Obtain 50 Dark Leatty Furball.
Obtain 2 Hector's Tail.
Return to him after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Master Sergeant Fox's Secret
procedures: Talk to Master Sergeant Fox  at El Nath.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Pepe's Fish.
Obtain 10 Apple.
Obtain 10 Egg.
Obtain 10 Red-Bean Soup.
Return to him after you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: Protect Nero!
rewards: Scroll for Pet Equip. for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Pet Equip. for Speed 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ericsson in Orbis: Orbis Park.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Cellion.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Lioner.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Grupin.
Collect 50 Solid Horn.
Once you have collected all the items needed and defeated the monsters, go back to Ericsson and talk to him.

chain.name: Hughes' Hobby
procedures: Search for a portal in a hole in Orbis: Orbis Tower <B2>.
Enter the hole and talk to Hughes the Fuse.
Hunt for 10 Toy Baby Seal.
Kill 50 Scuba Pepe.
Return to Hughes the Fuse once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Hughes'  Weird Invention
procedures: Search for a portal in a hole in Orbis: Orbis Tower <B2>.
Enter the hole and talk to Hughes the Fuse.
Hunt for 50 Snorkle.
Hunt for 50 Air Bubble.
Obtain 5 Steel Plate.
Obtain 30 Screw.
Return to Hughes the Fuse and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Hughes' Research Material
procedures: Equip the Oxygen Tank obtained from Hughes'  Weird Invention quest.
Search for a portal in a hole in Orbis: Orbis Tower <B2>.
Enter the hole and talk to Hughes the Fuse.
Collect 20 Seal Skin.
Collect 20 Seal Tooth.
Return to Hughes the Fuse once you have collected all the items.

chain.name: The Bottled-Up Letter             (Level 35 and above)
procedures: Obtain 1 SOS Letter before initiating this quest.
Talk to Robinson in Aqua Road: Two Palm Trees.
Obtain 1 Pure Water.
Head back to Robinson and give him the item.

chain.name: Robinson's ID             (Level 35 and above)
procedures: Go to Omega Sector: Silo and talk to Kay.

chain.name: Sending Relief             (Level 35 and above)
rewards: Great Red Helmet x 1 if you are a Warrior
Red Guiltian x 1 if you are a Magician
Red Distinction x 1 if you are a Bowman
Red Pilfer x 1 if you are a Thief
Blue Den Marine x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Return to Robinson and give him the item rewarded by Kay.

chain.name: Missing Staff Sergeant Charlie
procedures: Talk to Master Sergeant Fox  in El Nath.
Find and talk to Staff Sergeant Charlie in Orbis

chain.name: A Request from Staff Sergeant Charlie
rewards: A Piece of An Ancient Scroll x 1
procedures: After you have talked to Staff Sergeant Charlie, collect 2 Orihalcon Plate.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Missing Sergeant Bravo
procedures: Look for Sergeant Bravo at El Nath: Icy Cold Field and talk to him.

chain.name: A Request from Sergeant Bravo
rewards: A Piece of An Ancient Scroll x 1
procedures: After you have talked to Sergeant Bravo, collect 2 Adamantium Plate.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Missing Corporal Easy
procedures: Head towards Orbis: Cloud Park VI to find Corporal Easy.

chain.name: A Request From Corporal Easy
rewards: A Piece of An Ancient Scroll x 1
procedures: After you have talked to Corporal Easy, collect 2 Sapphire.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Returning To Master Sergeant Fox
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 10% x 1
procedures: Head back to El Nath, talk to Master Sergeant Fox  and give him the collected items.

itemsNeeded.name: A Piece of An Ancient Scroll

name: The Chaos Behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice

chain.name: The Nependeath Juice
procedures: Talk to Alfonse Green at Orbis: Cloud Park I.
Talk to Ericsson in Orbis: Orbis Park.

chain.name: Ericsson Loves Cats
procedures: If you have not started this portion of the quest, start it with Ericsson, otherwise talk to Elma the Housekeeper.
Collect 100 Star Pixie's Starpiece.
Collect 80 Lunar Pixie's Moonpiece.
Return to Elma the Housekeeper.  Give the collected items and 10,000 mesos to obtain the Lunar Wristband.
Give the Lunar Wristband to Ericsson

chain.name: Ericsson's Reward
procedures: Collect 150 Nependeath's Seed.
Collect 80 Dark Nependeath's Seed.
Go back to Ericsson and give him the collected items to receive Sap Of Nependeath.

chain.name: Elma's Nependeath Juice
procedures: Talk to Elma the Housekeeper.
Go to Victoria Road: The Field South of Ellinia and talk to Estelle.
Hunt for 60 Lupin's Banana.
Hunt for 30 Sap of Ancient Tree.
Hunt for 10 Pig's Head.
Return to Estelle and talk to her to receive 1 Sweet Syrup.
Go to Florina Beach and collect 20 Coconut.
Hunt for 1 Nependeath's Honey.
Return to Elma the Housekeeper with all the collected items.

chain.name: Alfonse's Smile
procedures: Talk to Alfonse Green and give him the Nependeath Juice.

name: A Healthy Snack for the Huskies

chain.name: A Healthy Snack for the Huskies
procedures: Head to Aqua Road: Snowy Whale's Island and talk to Nanuke.
Hunt for 50 Seal Meat.
Return to Nanuke and give him the collected item.

name: What the White Mama Monkey Stole

chain.name: What the White Mama Monkey Stole
rewards: This quest is repeatable every 60 minutes.
procedures: Talk to Toniza.
Talk to Dao and enter in Mini Dungeon : Monkey Temple 4. You must have a Golden Ticket or Premium Golden Ticket with you to enter.
Hunt White Mama Monkey and collect 20 Fresh Lime.
Return to Toniza and talk to him.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Pirate Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 25 Soft Feather.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Sakura and the Seal
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Sakura in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 100 Toy Baby Seal.
Go back to Sakura after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Tsuri and the Gourmet Dish
procedures: Look for Tsuri in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 100 Seal Meat.
Return to Tsuri and give him the collected item.

chain.name: War of Pang Pang
procedures: Talk to Poni Chai in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Collect 30 Toy Soldier Sword from Toy Trojan.
Return to Poni Chai after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Warrior Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 15 Sticky Spiderweb.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Magician Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 1 Lunar Pixie's Moonpiece.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Bowman Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 20 Toy Duckling.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Thief Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 20 Rat Trap.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Cupid's Courier (Beginner Only)
rewards: This quest is repeatable after 24 hours without collecting the items.
procedures: Talk to Angelique in Amoria.
Head over to Aqua Road: Tae Gong's Ferry and talk to Richard the Sailor.
Hunt for 25 Stiff Feather.
Return to Richard the Sailor after you have collected the items. You will obtain 1 Richard's Letter.
Go back to Angelique and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: The Sakura Garden 1
procedures: Talk to Jacob in Amoria.
Hunt for 25 Cherry Blossom Seed from Sakura Cellion.
Hunt for 10 Silk Feather from Jr. Lioner.
Hunt for 10 Leather.
Return to Jacob after you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Sakura Garden 2 - Finishing Touches             (Level 37 and above)
procedures: Talk to Jacob in Amoria.
Hunt for 20 White/Purple Gift Box from Pink Teddy.
Hunt for 10 Toy Baby Seal from Jr. Seal.
Hunt for 10 Lupin Doll from Lupin.
Return to Jacob after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Circle of Trust 1 (The Unmarried Couple)
procedures: Talk to Gary and Shatima in Amoria.
The next sub-quest, Circle of Trust 2 (A Bond is Forged) will then be initiated.
After you have the completed the sub-quest mentioned, head back to Gary and Shatima and talk to them.

chain.name: Circle of Trust 2 (A Bond is Forged)
procedures: Hunt for 20 Ring Fragment from Tweeter.
Return to Moony after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Tsuri's Special Seafood 1
procedures: Talk to Tsuri in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 1 Snorkle from Scuba Pepe.
Return to Tsuri and give him all the collected items.

chain.name: Tsuri's Special Seafood 2
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Tsuri in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 100 Poopa Egg from Poopa.
Go back to Tsuri and give him the collected items.

chain.name: The Lantern at Mushroom Shrine
procedures: Talk to Hikari in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 50 Worn Paper Lantern from Paper Lantern Ghost.
Kill 100 Paper Lantern Ghost.
Return to Hikari once you have completed the task.

name: Sakura, the Kitty and the Orange Marble

chain.name: The Scared Kitty
procedures: Talk to Fraidy Cat in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Obtain 1 Pet Food  and give it to Fraidy Cat.

chain.name: Sakura's Crying
procedures: Search for Sakura in the same town and talk to her.

chain.name: Sakura's Request
procedures: Talk to Sakura again and she will request you to search for an item for her.

chain.name: Learning to Speak the Kitty Language
procedures: In the same town, talk to Boss Kitty.
Head back to Fraidy Cat and talk to it.

chain.name: I Should Talk to the Boss Kitty in Kitty Language
procedures: Search for Boss Kitty again.

chain.name: Dealing with Boss Kitty
procedures: Obtain 300 Fried Chicken before talking to Boss Kitty again.
Answer the questions from Boss Kitty correctly. Every time you answer the question wrong, you will need to give another 300 Fried Chicken.

chain.name: Sakura, the Kitty and the Orange Marble
rewards: Dark Scroll for Shoes for Jump 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for HP 30% x 1
procedures: Return to Sakura and give her the Orange Marble.

chain.name: Mariwaka of Performer Training
rewards: This quest is only for levels below 40.
procedures: Look for Mariwaka in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Kill 10 Leader A and 10 Leader B.
Go back to Mariwaka once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Movie Star
rewards: Dark Scroll for Helmet for DEF 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for INT 30% x 1
This quest is only for levels below 40.
procedures: Talk to Furano in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Kill 1 Mushmom.
Go back to Furano once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Eliminating Dark Cloud Fox
rewards: Dark Cloud Fox AKA Giant Cloud Fox
procedures: Talk to Hanako in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Kill 80 Dark Cloud Fox.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

chain.name: A Little Mischief
rewards: Dark Scroll for Face Accessory for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Face Accessory for HP 70% x 1
procedures: Talk to Kamedeya at Zipangu: Outside Ninja Castle.
Hunt for 100 Chunin Poison Dart from Chunin.
Return and talk to Kamedeya.

chain.name: Helping Others             (Level 40 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Face Accessory for HP 10% x 1
Scroll for Face Accessory for HP 60% x 1
Scroll for Face Accessory for HP 100% x 1
procedures: Talk to Aoi at Zipangu: Outside Ninja Castle.
Then talk to Nagare at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.

chain.name: Cooperation             (Level 50 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Face Accessory for Avoidability 10% x 1
Scroll for Face Accessory for Avoidability 60% x 1
Scroll for Face Accessory for Avoidability 100% x 1
procedures: Talk to Nagare at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.
Hunt for 50 Kunoichi Dagger from Kunoichi.
Then talk to Aoi at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.

chain.name: Collecting Info             (Level 60 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Eye Accessory for Accuracy 10% x 1
Scroll for Eye Accessory for Accuracy 60% x 1
Scroll for Eye Accessory for Accuracy 100% x 1
procedures: Talk to Aoi at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.
Hunt for 50 Ninto Scroll from Ninto and 1 Kacchuu Musha Fragment from Kacchuu Musha.
Then talk to Anz at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.

chain.name: Defeat the Great Offender             (Level 70 and above)
rewards: Dark Scroll for Face Accessory for Avoidability 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Face Accessory for Avoidability 70% x 1
Dark Scroll for Eye Accessory for Accuracy 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Eye Accessory for Accuracy 70% x 1
Dark Scroll for Eye Accessory for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Eye Accessory for INT 70% x 1
procedures: Talk to Anz at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.
Hunt for 1 Emperor Toad Wallet by defeating Castellan Toad.
Then return and talk to Anz.

chain.name: A Peaceful World             (Level 70 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Eye Accessory for INT 10% x 1
Scroll for Eye Accessory for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Eye Accessory for INT 100% x 1
procedures: Talk to Anz at Zipangu: Inside the Castle Gate.
Get the Castellan's Stolen Armrest from Anz and then go and see Aoi at Zipangu: Outside Ninja Castle.

chain.name: Subani's Legacy - Discovery             (Level 36 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.
Kill 50 Killa Bee.
Kill 30 Mighty Maple Eater.
Kill 40 Fire Tusk.
Return to John Barricade after your tasks are completed.

chain.name: Subani's Legacy - Transgression             (Level 38 and above)
procedures: Talk to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.
Hunt for 50 Hyper Glyph from Electrophant.
Return to John Barricade after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Subani's Legacy - Deliverance             (Level 44 and above)
procedures: Talk to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.
Hunt for 50 MesoGear Map Piece from I.AM.ROBOT.
Return to John Barricade after you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Fallen Woods
procedures: Talk to Taggrin in Phantom Forest: Dead Man's Gorge.
Hunt for 50 Phantom Seed from Phantom Tree [1] and Phantom Tree [2].
Return to Taggrin once you have completed the task.

chain.name: ReVersal
rewards: Dark Scroll for Gloves for ATT 70% x 1
procedures: Talk to Elpam Gorlab in New Leaf City.
Hunt for 60 Temporal Fragment from Tick-Tock.
Return to Elpam Gorlab after you have collected the items.
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center

chain.name: Fool's Gold             (Level 40 and above)
rewards:
Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

100,000 mesos
25,000 experience
procedures: Talk to Lita Lawless in New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center
